reviews.sentence: OMG. Best Kept Secret in Baton Rouge. We stayed there for Mardi Gras weekend from 2 14 to 2 18. Everything was perfect Ms Arceina Crayton checked us in was very helpful beautiful personality great customer service very satisfied we had a room with a balcony perfect. We only had one problem the guest next door was very loud at midnight. called down stairs spoke with Ms Jasime then security on site handled the situation. The hotel was very clean plenty of places to eat Joes Crab shack Texass Road house Chills Waffle house also restaurant down stairs. We did not mind the ride back and forward to NOLA because this hotel was worth it.

It was a pleasant stay. I decided to visit this hotel once again after staying at the adjacent Residence Inn a few times. Check in was efficient and pleasant I was given a comfortable room that was functional and had a good work space. I did not really use too many of the other facilities so I can not comment on the but I believe the hotel is as well equipped as a Courtyard Hotel can be. I believe it advertises both wired and wireless internet but I only saw the wireless and not the wired. They need to fix that. However the internet worked fine. Although not totally pertinent this season it is important to have good air conditioning and I believe that it is up to the task. The TV was out a couple of times during intense rain and there are some cracks depressions in parts of the parking lot so particularly when it is raining or about to rain ensure you have not parked in one of these low spots. I did and got wet shoessOveral it was a brief but pleasant stay.

Wonderful short stay. I loved the location and the rooms. They looked and felt clean. The bathroom was large and the beds were incredibly comfortable. The price was great and it had a good balcony to sit out on. Defiantly would recommend this hotel to others.

Very nice and clean. Stayed for only one night great location near shopping and lots of choices for restaurants nearby. Rooms were nice and the price was reasonable. There is an indoor pool for the kids to splash around in. Would definitely stay here again.
Wish I could get it back. Everything at the hotel was fantastic but I was overcharged for my room. I was told it was just a holding deposit but I have checked out and still do not have my money back.

Great choice for overnight rest. After a long day of driving it was very nice to be able to stop somewhere and relax. The room was very clean and comfortable. We were able to get some much needed sleep and get back on our way. We will definitely choose this hotel again.

Very pleasant. Had a small but nice suite. Was here on business. They did a good job setting up the meeting room which was available all day and into the evening. Staff very friendly and helpful. Have a small bar area but quite adequate to have a private chat with clients. Only complaint I have was the love seat on my room must have been sat on by a 500 pound gorilla.
Enjoyed my stay. Had a great stay at the Courtyard by Mariot. Check in was a breeze and the staff is extremely polite. Even took time to find an extra pillow for me at 3 am. Two thumbs up.
Great Sleep. Room was very comfortable and clean. Will recommend to anyone in the area.

This hotel needs renovation. I have never rated a hotel this poorly. The lobby and common areas seemed well taken care of the room was not. I stayed on a bottom floor room. It was in very bad shape. The sliding glass patio door latch lock did not work at all. It did have a bar to close. The bar was not used until I checked in and discovered it. The patio door was so dirty. The AC was split open and dangling from the wall the office chair was ragged the bathtub finish was in bad shape and the drain did not work. The carpets were stained. The plugs did not work on the desk and the wall outlets near by were overloaded. In the good side the bed was clean and comfortable and I only needed the room for one short night so I stayed. The rate was a typical Mariot rate for such a bad room. I will not be back.

Charge too much for no services. Courtyard Mariots change way too much without providing any services. do not provide free breakfast free internet only for three devices. Horrible front desk staff. Because of this experience and a few before do not plan to stay in courtyard in future.
Okay. The hotel was clean and the beds comfortable but the king room to small and did not like that we had to go look for breakfast every morning with those to two things was a pulse but was not.

Old and Smelly. The heater was broken got that fixed. The iron did not work the coffee pot was not only broken but to discusting to use if it did work and the room smelled like body odor. No breakfast or even coffee for free. somenofnthe courtyards are really nice it is unfortunate how inconsistent they can be. I will never stay at this one again.

Port in the Storm. My grandchildren said those were the best beds ever. We were in town for a Travel Ball Tournament. Staff were very accommodating. Accommodations were very attractive comfortable and inviting. After a wet cool day at the ball park our rooms were literally a port in the storm. A place to relax and rest for the next round of games. Lots of restaurants close by both take out and eat in. Thank you Courtyard.

I will definitely be booking again with The Courtyard Mariot. The staff was awesome. The location was easy to find and convenient. The hotel had all the amenities I need pool gym and bar bistro. The towels in the bathroom had hair on them from previous guest. The trash cans had no liners. Television only had a selected few stations.
The lobby is wonderful and the customer service was great. The room had an odd smell but it looked very clean and the bed is so comfortable. I would definitely recommend it.

Change of personality. This has been my hotel for many years. I call and make reservations and when I show up they know me by name and always makes me feel like home. Don’t know what happened to the personalities one day I show up and I got the rude treatment. They gave me a terrible room yes they have them. I requested a supervisor to kindly find me a better room. She was equally rude and told me kind of “ take it or leave it”. So I left and now staying at other hotels. Oh well.
Good. Employees were friendly and it was a good atmospherehot tub was not working.

Nice place nice staff. I stayed here for business and had a very pleasant experience. I checked in late and Taylor was very pleasant to deal with. She referred local restaurants and was a pleasure. My room was great comfy bed nice TV. The hotel is just like other Courtyards so you know you can expect a nice place to stay.
Breakfast was not included in the cost of the room but the restaurant was nice and the rooms were well cared for.
New building floor of room was damp. May not have dried properly after steam clean.

Just okay. The customer service at the hotel is really great. The staff is friendly and helpful. The room however smelled like mold there ’s carpet under the sink so I ’m pretty sure that was where the problem was. The hallway also smelled like stale cigarette smoke even though all of the rooms were no smoking rooms. The bed was pretty uncomfortable it had a dip in the mattress. The pillows were very flat and stiff. Not the best Courtyard that I ’ve stayed in.
Good. room setup and design was excelentpaper thin walls. could hear ever vehicle on the interstate.

The room was nicely decorated and clean but the sound buffering was woefully inadequate. The noise from the adjacent highway was terribly loud very disquieting after a full day of traveling. The shower drain did not function properly. The water just pooled up in the stall and started to overflow. Brand new tile and surround with an odd rectangular drain. It may be trendy but I had prefer one that works. This hotel may be okay but the room was not.
Fridge NOT WORKING HAD TO THROW FOOD AWAY other than that good.

I booked my stay for payment at the hotel. Upon check in I was charge for two nights and a nightly deposit for incidentals. During my stay the hotel attempted to charge my card 3 more times for the nightly room rate. I called the front desk and the young lady on duty was nonchalant wi. th me saying there is nothing I can do about it you need to talk to my manager on tomorrow MondayWhen I checked out early Monday morning. the night auditor Had I not placed the charge for this stay on a card with a low limit I would havev.
I liked the cleanliness but hated that there were no microwaves in the rooms.

Good first. Great location. Lots of good restaurants and breakfast choices. Clean room. Resonable price. Bad room is small with oversized furniture making it feel even smaller. Dresser and TV are to the side of the bed making viewing difficult. Very small vanity area.

I liked the suit with separate bedroom but the door to the room included the door to the bathroom. So every time the kids had to go they went thru the door disturbing us. And speaking of the bathroom the water pressure sucks but I ’ve come to expect that at most hotels the problem was that the toilet took over 25 minutes to fill back up after flushing. I went with my 2 teenage daughters and my wife so that was a major inconvenience and someone was always waiting to flush. The bedroom did have a tv with cable. But the remote only worked about 2 ft from the tv and you could watch for about 15 minutes and then the sound would just go away. And we had to turn the tv off and wait like 20 min and turn it back on and it would work again for only 10 minutes this time. Pretty annoying. One last thing when we got there they asked for a card in case I charged anything to the room or for incidental damages so I was more then happy to give them my debt card. They told me there will be “ absolutely no charges ” other then incidental. So I said good I do n’t have to worry about them charging anything so I have my debt card. We I look at my account and they charged 20 on my card. I called they said it will fall off. So “ Absolutely no charges ” means 20 apparently. other then ALL of that. yeah it was great. They could have at least gave me a break on the price. Or not taken 20 from me which I have still not gotten back. They said 3 5 days from check out. It ’s been 6. smh.

I had reserved a regular king room. When we arrived we were sent to the sister property next door and took our bags across the property. It was late and we wanted to get to the room we paid for. When we arrived next door we were put in a handicap room with a queen bed. Not at all what we reserved and paid for. We did n’t have the time or energy to complain about the situation any further.
